mainText:
We at Bank of Entitlement invite YOU to experience the exclusive VIP treatment you deserve-where your entitlement is our priority!

Visit Bank of Entitlement dot com for more.

ENTITLEMENT STORY: So, get this: I strolled into a coffee shop, exuding my undeniable aura of privilege, when I spotted a freshly brewed latte sitting unclaimed on the counter. Without a second thought, I confidently snatched it up, taking a long, luxurious sip. Suddenly, a barista approached me, eyes narrowed in suspicion, and accused me of stealing someone else's drink. Can you believe the nerve? I simply scoffed and declared, "Excuse me, but clearly this latte was meant for me. I am Hot Josh, after all." The barista, clearly intimidated by my presence, apologized profusely and offered me a free pastry as compensation for the inconvenience. As I walked out, sipping my "acquired" latte, I couldn't help but revel in my entitlement, knowing that the world would always bend to accommodate me.
